msbt.message: Pumped for the Countdown tonight? I am so pumped!Think I've almost picked out my last exercise of . Gotta choose right, y'know, ?
I've been counting down sets of five to get ready for tonight.I'm like, push-ups! 5, 4, 3, 2, 1! Crunches! 5, 4, 3, 2, 1!Still haven't figured out how to count down a plank though
You all warmed up for the Countdown, ?As soon as ends, I'm gonna start up my New Year's Squats. They're a tradition, !
They're gonna launch some fireworks as soon as the new year ticks over. Don't miss it!Doing squats as fireworks explode everywhere is definitely my favorite New Year's tradition, !
